section.title: Warehouse Calendar Exception
section.para:
warehouses creating new exceptions for
calendars creating new exceptions for To define an exception to the standard work week for a Warehouse, select the "NEW" button. The following screen will appear:
When defining an exception to the standard work week for a Warehouse, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to create the calendar exception for all Warehouses.
Settings made using this option will be inherited by all Warehouses.
Select the Warehouse whose work week you want to define.
Specify which days the Warehouse is open for business. Settings made using this option are specific to the selected Warehouse.
Enter text to describe the calendar exception.
Specify the date when the calendar exception begins.
Specify the date when the calendar exception ends.

tip.para: If the calendar exception is one day long, use the same date in the start date and end date fields.

listitem.para: Specify which type of calendar exception you are defining:
Open: If selected, you are indicating the specified Warehouse(s) is open during the defined time period.
Closed: If selected, you are indicating the specified Warehouse(s) is closed during the defined time period.
